scripts.build: echo '--- VERCEL BUILD SCRIPT START ---' && npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend && echo '--- VERCEL BUILD SCRIPT COMPLETE ---'
scripts.build:frontend: echo '--- Building frontend ---' && cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && echo '--- Moving frontend output to /public ---' && mv frontend/dist public
scripts.build:backend: echo '--- Preparing backend assets ---' && mkdir -p /tmp/build && pip install --break-system-packages --target=/tmp/build -r backend/requirements-build.txt && PYTHONPATH=/tmp/build python scripts/prepare_model.py api && rm -rf /tmp/build ~/.cache && echo 'Build deps cleaned'
